item.title: Porting PAGA results from scanpy to R
item.description: Seurat and scanpy are both great frameworks to analyze single-cell RNA-seq data, the main difference being the language they are designed for. Most of the methods frequently used in the literature are available in both toolkits and the workflow is essentially the same.
